Download gd from 
http://www.libgd.org/
(currently from: https://bitbucket.org/pierrejoye/gd-libgd/downloads)

and extract to this folder.
(currently: extract from ../src/ into this folder)

Nothing has to be installed.

This is used in x02_gd_example.cpp
